meanings.definition: Designed to repel or kill mosquitoes.
meanings.sent1: The antimosquito spray kept the bugs away during our picnic.
meanings.sent2: I bought an antimosquito candle to use on our camping trip.
meanings.sent3: The antimosquito lotion made me smell like a lemon tree!
meanings.sent4: Her voice was like an antimosquito sound, driving everyone away.
meanings.sent5: The antimosquito netting was so fine, it blocked even the tiniest insects.

meanings.definition: A substance or device used to prevent mosquitoes from biting.
meanings.sent1: We set up an antimosquito device in the backyard to enjoy our barbecue.
meanings.sent2: The antimosquito spray was effective in keeping the bugs at bay.
meanings.sent3: The antimosquito bracelet looked like a stylish accessory.
meanings.sent4: The antimosquito trap worked like a charm, catching all the pests.
meanings.sent5: The antimosquito screen on the window allowed fresh air in without any insects.
